home.title: Hey there!
home.text1: By simply providing a question and a list of correct answers you can create your own unique learning cards. Taking the effort to make the cards and then 'playing' with them hopefully helps you memorize the given answers.
home.text2: Improve your learning time and efficiency with unique, self made cards!

404.paragraph1: We are afraid the page you are looking for does not exist.
404.paragraph2: Try returning to the home page and navigate to the desired page once again.
